title: unique world generator creates objects in collision with rover

content.raw:
For task2, we noticed that the unique world generator creates objects in collision with Rover impacting our detection algorithms in some cases. Given that such scenarios cannot occur in real world, can we assume that the scripts will be fixed before the finals and we ignore such worlds for now?

Attached is an example of the box in collision with a wheel of the rover.  World was generated using 
```
#!bash

erb t=2 unique.world.erb > unique_task2.world
```
